titleStmt.title: Iter boreale with large additions of several other poems : being an exact collection of all hitherto extant : never before published together / the author R. Wild.
titleStmt.author: Wild, Robert, 1609-1679.

notesStmt.note: "The recantation of a penitent Proteus" and "The fair quarrel" each has special title page.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
